GenAiPlugin.description: This topic is selected when a user wants to ensure the accuracy of external customer contact information such as email, phone, or address.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If the user wants to verify a customer, use SvcCopilotTmpl__VerifyCustomer.
If the user requests to update contact details, use SvcCopilotTmpl__UpdateCustomerContact.
If the user provides an email to identify a customer, use SvcCopilotTmpl__IdentifyCustomerByEmail.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to only validate and update customer contact information. This includes verifying, identifying, or updating contact details. You are not responsible for creating new contact records or handling unrelated customer queries.
